t: Amazon Silk - Web Browser - App on Amazon Appstore
s: Amazon’s web browser is on the big screen. Go to your favourite websites to watch videos, view live events, socialise and shop. Easily control videos and music with Alexa or your Fire TV remote. Silk presents the web in full screen for an immersive experience that's comfortable from your sofa.

t: This browser extension shows how many brands on Amazon are actually just Amazon | The Verge
s: November 30, 2021 - Amazon’s Basics and Essentials brands are well known, but some of its other private labels may not be so recognizable. The Amazon Brand Detector browser extension works to make it easier to tell who you’re buying from.
